full_summary:
## Title [English and French]
#### Evaluation of Zero Emissions Vehicle Infrastructure Program
#### Évaluation du Programme d’infrastructure pour les véhicules zéro émission

### Solicitation Details
- **Solicitation Number:** NRCan- 500073153-A
- **Reference Number:** cb-6554-21524178
- **Amendment Number:** 2
- **Publishing Date:** June 20, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** June 20, 2023
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 1, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** July 31, 2024

### Request for Proposal

Natural Resources Canada invites proposals from qualified Suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method, Tier 1( up to $3.75M) with a requirement of Expert-conseil en services d’évaluation, Principal, and Validation- Services d'évaluation, Intermédiaire.

The proposed contract duration shall be from contract award to December 31, 2024, inclusive.

The successful bidder will support the evaluation of the Zero Emissions Vehicle Infrastructure Program (ZEVIP) and will be required to provide evaluation services to Natural Resources Canada.

### Security Clearance
Company:
- Must meet Canada's minimum security requirements.

Resources:
- Must meet Canada's minimum security requirements.

Document Safeguarding:
- Must meet Canada's minimum document safeguarding requirements.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is governed by the following Trade Agreements:

- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

To obtain further information, please refer to the solicitation documents.

### Contact Information
- **Name:** Roya Ayam
- **Email:** roya.ayam@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
- **Phone:** 1 (587) 337-3877
Please note that this procurement is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. If you are a “Qualified SA Holder” and wish to be included in the refresh cycle for the TSPS Method, please contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.  You can also refer to clause 12 of the solicitation document for information on how
